name: pino-test
description: A set of API to easily test the Pino logger

scripts.test: npm run lint && node --test **/*.test.js && npm run test-types
scripts.test-coverage: npm run lint && node --experimental-test-coverage --test-reporter=spec --test **/*.test.js && npm run test-types
scripts.test-ci: npm run lint && node --test **/*.test.js && npm run test-types
scripts.test-ci-pnpm: pnpm run lint && node --test **/*.test.js && pnpm run test-types
